arStrings.szText: If {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} Critically Strikes, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds. This effect can only happen once per cast.
{c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} has an additional {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance.
After {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} hits an enemy, you generate {c_number}[SF_17 * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Essence over the next {c_number}{buffduration:MANA_REGEN}{/c} seconds.
